name: Challenge Fruit Shooting 3D
description:
Challenge Fruit Shooting 3D is fun, challenging and addictive game, take a deep breath, set your aim and shoot in the realistic sniper games scene targets.Test your skills and play the most competitive shooting games every.

Features:

* Realistic 3D envoirnment in 4 beautiful venues
* Simple and intuitive interface and controls
* Many challenging levels of various game-plays
